name: Artyelp.com
overview:
Artyelp.com was created to connect, inspire and empower artists all around the world . Established in San Francisco, CA Artyelp is the best online social network for artists and art lovers, attracting 25 million unique visitors per month .

Artyelp.com is an outlet that might serve as the catalyst to promote and supports artists at every level by offering a range of free services. Much like a canvas, Artyelp allows artists to show their work to an audience, one that would not have had an opportunity to hear or see talent from all over the world. However, seeing is just the first step. Artyelp.com also allows customers to actually purchase original artwork and prints.

Mission: Our goal is to provide ongoing opportunities for artists to connect with people who support the arts, increasing their opportunities to display their art.

Artyelp.com is offering artists an opportunity to exhibit their work on “Artist of the Week” the companyâ€™s marquee art program designed to allow the discovery and championing of emerging artists through a series of specially tailored online and offline promotional opportunities.

milestones.description: Self-Service Interface Enables Event Marketers to Manage and Share Content Anywhere and Anytime
In 1972 during a period of military dictatorship in Brazil, police officers raided the house of artist Rubens Camargo and seized eight paintings, which they considered subversive.
milestones.source_description: Art Student Makes One Hundred Thousands Dollars with Art Deal on the Internet
